data.title: Miranda Raison - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Miranda Raison: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Actress of the stage and screen who landed a breakthrough role in the BBC series Spooks (AKA MI-5) before portraying a model in the ITV1 show Married Single Other. She joined the revival of FOX's 24, 24: Live Another Day, in a recurring role.

Before Fame

She trained at the Webber Douglas Academy of Dramatic Art.

Trivia

She starred in the title role of a stage production of Anne Boleyn at Shakespeare's Globe, and reprised the role in Henry VIII.

Family Life

She was born Miranda Caroline Raison in Burnham Thorpe, Norfolk, England to parents Caroline and Nick Raison who divorced when she was five. Her mother read news for Anglia Television and her father was a jazz pianist. She married and divorced Raza Jaffrey.

Associated With
